sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Small Single-Use Plastic Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Small Single-Use Plastic Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Small, single-use plastic bottles at hotels.
sections.text: Small, single-use plastic bottles at hotels.

sections.heading: Penalties. A hotel in violation of this Act shall receive a written warning from the local unit of government in which the hotel is located for the first violation
sections.text: The written warning shall recite the violation and advise that subsequent violations may result in citations and penalties. A hotel tha
